scripts.test: bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server stop; bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server && webpack --config=config/webpack/test.js; bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server stop
scripts.start: bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server stop; bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server && bundle exec webpack-dev-server --config ./config/webpack/development.js; bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server stop
scripts.build: bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server stop; bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server && webpack --config=config/webpack/production.js; bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server stop
